object.description:
You can Attack with your both hands for you Action. You perform main hand attack as normal. If the main hand attack hits, you may attack with second hand any available target. 

If the main hand roll was NOT A CRITICAL, for secondary hand attack hit roll use the first one but reversed (for example, from 34 to 43). 
If the main hand attack WAS A CRITICAL, for your second attack use your Critical Table roll.

Damage of the second attack is calculated as normal. Secondary hand attack Test also suffers -20 penalty unless you have Ambidextrous Talent.

When you attack with both weapons, all your defensive rolls take -10 penalty until you next Turn. Unless both attacks hit, you do not gain an Advantage.

object.tests: Melee or Ranged when attacking with two weapons

object.description:

0 - 1 SL: Opponent loses weapon which flies 1d10 feet in random direction
2- 3 SL: As above, but you determine the distance
4 - 5 SL: YOu also determine the direction
6+ SL: You may chose to take opponent's weapon if you have a free hand
This Talent cannot be used against opponents with no weapons, or with Size larger than you.
